attachments.title: MarkerElement allowable shapes
attachments.text: I was searching for which shape symbols are allowable in MarkerElements for the marker kwarg. I identified :circle was what I needed, but wasn’t able to find where the possibilities are documented. Using characters like o is shown here, but that doesn’t have color.

text: I'd rather err on the side of having more than fewer questions on discourse, I don't really want to post under every one asked here whether it should go there or not. I'm just currently doing that because the change in procedure is recent, and I guess it will take a while until people think of discourse first for asking Makie questions :)
